      public static void showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert alert, String title, String header, String content)
      Utility method to configure and display an alert dialog.
      Parameters:
      alert - the Alert to display
      title - the title of the alert
      header - the optional header text
      content - the content message of the alert
